Freebies! (Or Something Close)

Published on January 27, 2025 | By JW

Games

  • NYT Games: Many public libraries give unlimited one-day access passes. You can renew your access every day, though the NYT Games app can be buggy with the wrong order of operations, so make sure to claim the access code first before opening the app for the day. Example libraries/codes:
    • Pitkin County Library: b77295e7c59624db
    • St. Louis County Library: 3d7eefc332d28eb8
    • Cuyahoga County Public Library: e8e36be18f350ec4
    • Mountain View Public Library: 9cfcd777fcf92b34; also access to Cooking and News
    • Clermont County Public Library: e213c01c9d3f9290 (access to all of the NYT)
  • Epic Games Store: Free game every week.

Streaming

  • FMHY: Huge repository for free stuff on the internet, including streaming.
  • StreamEast
  • 1Stream
  • Buffstreams
  • NBABite
  • NHLBite

Other

  • Library Genesis


Last updated 20250130.
